unnormalised: The Municipal Corp. of Delhi (MCD) is really playing hide-and-seek with our property taxes, isn't it? Their official address, supposedly at Dr. SPM Civic Centre, JLN Marg, Delhi, 110002, is harder to find than a decent auto-rickshaw during rush hour. You’d think for a place where we begrudgingly hand over our hard-earned rupees, they’d put up some blinking neon signs.
normalised: The Municipal Corporation of Delhi (M-C-D) is really playing hide-and-seek with our property taxes, isn't it? Their official address, supposedly at Doctor S-P-M Civic Centre, J-L-N Marg, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and two, is harder to find than a decent auto-rickshaw during rush hour. You'd think for a place where we begrudgingly hand over our hard-earned rupees, they'd put up some blinking neon signs.

unnormalised: Seriously, navigating the bureaucratic maze to pay taxes feels like a real-life escape room challenge. I swear, the last time I tried, I ended up at some random tea stall near ITO, Delhi, 110001, asking the chaiwala if he knew the way. He probably knew more about government efficiency than anyone inside the MCD.
normalised: Seriously, navigating the bureaucratic maze to pay taxes feels like a real-life escape room challenge. I swear, the last time I tried, I ended up at some random tea stall near I-T-O, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and one, asking the chaiwala if he knew the way. He probably knew more about government efficiency than anyone inside the M-C-D.

unnormalised: And let's not forget the Delhi Development Authority (DDA), conveniently located... somewhere in Vikas Sadan, INA, Delhi, 110023. Trying to figure out which floor your file landed on is an adventure in itself. It’s like they’re deliberately spreading misinformation to keep us entertained. Or maybe they just enjoy the chaos.
normalised: And let's not forget the Delhi Development Authority (D-D-A), conveniently located... somewhere in Vikas Sadan, I-N-A, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and twenty three. Trying to figure out which floor your file landed on is an adventure in itself. It's like they're deliberately spreading misinformation to keep us entertained. Or maybe they just enjoy the chaos.

unnormalised: Even the Income Tax Department, with its imposing office at Mayur Bhawan, Shankar Market, Connaught Place, New Delhi, 110001, seems to have perfected the art of making a simple task needlessly complicated. You enter with a clear conscience, ready to pay your dues, and exit questioning the very fabric of reality.
normalised: Even the Income Tax Department, with its imposing office at Mayur Bhawan, Shankar Market, Connaught Place, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and one, seems to have perfected the art of making a simple task needlessly complicated. You enter with a clear conscience, ready to pay your dues, and exit questioning the very fabric of reality.

unnormalised: So next time you're feeling bored, skip Netflix and try finding a government office. It’s way more thrilling, and arguably just as funny – albeit in a darkly sarcastic, “I want to pull my hair out” kind of way. Just remember to pack a good sense of humour and maybe a GPS. You'll definitely need it.
normalised: So next time you're feeling bored, skip Netflix and try finding a government office. It's way more thrilling, and arguably just as funny – albeit in a darkly sarcastic, “I want to pull my hair out” kind of way. Just remember to pack a good sense of humor and maybe a G-P-S. You'll definitely need it.
